Post.title: dockermysql
Post._content:
linuxdockermysql



## 

2mysqlmysql_mastermysql_slave

dockernginx [nginx](https://github.com/wjhtime/docker_nginx)



## 

```
/root/docker/mysql/conf.d/master.cnf	master
/etc/mysql/conf.d/master.cnf	master
/root/docker/mysql/master-data	master
/var/lib/mysql	mysql
/root/docker/mysql/conf.d/slave.cnf	slave
/etc/mysql/conf.d/slave.cnf	slave
/root/docker/mysql/slave-data	slave
```



## 

1.mysql_master

```shell
# mysql
docker pull mysql:5.7

# root
docker run --name mysql_master -d -p 3307:3306 \
-v /root/docker/mysql/conf.d/master.cnf:/etc/mysql/conf.d/master.cnf \
-v /root/docker/mysql/master-data:/var/lib/mysql \
-e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=root mysql:5.7
```



2.mysql_slave

```shell
docker run --name mysql_slave -d -p 3308:3306 \
-v /root/docker/mysql/conf.d/slave.cnf:/etc/mysql/conf.d/slave.cnf \
-v /root/docker/mysql/slave-data:/var/lib/mysql \
-e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=root --link mysql_master:mysql_master mysql:5.7
```



3.backup

```
grant replication slave on *.* to 'backup'@'%' indentified by '111111';
```



pos

```
show master status;
```



4.

```
change master to master_host='mysql_master',master_user='backup',master_password='111111',master_file_log='mysql_bin.000003',master_log_pos=439,master_port=3306;
```



```mysql
# 
show slave status;
show master status;

# 
start slave;
```



mysql_master.cnf

```mysql
[mysqldump]
user=root
password='root'
[mysqld]
max_allowed_packet=8M
lower_case_table_names=1
character_set_server=utf8
max_connections=900
max_connect_errors=600
# id1
server_id=1
log-bin=mysql-bin

slow_query_log=1
long_query_time=1
log_error
```



mysql_slave.cnf

```mysql
[mysqldump]
user=root
password='root'
[mysqld]
max_allowed_packet=8M
lower_case_table_names=1
character_set_server=utf8
max_connections=900
max_connect_errors=600
# id2
server_id=2
log-bin=mysql-bin

slow_query_log=1
long_query_time=1
log_error
```



log-binmysql-bin



5.

```mysql
# master
flush tables with read lock;

# 
show master status;

# 
mysql_dump -R uroot -p database > /tmp/database.sql
unlock tables;


server_id=3
source /tmp/database.sql
change master to ...
```
Post.raw:

Post.title: swoole
Post._content:
githubswoolerelease



```shell
1. tar -zxvf swoole-src-4.0.3.tar.gz


2. cd swoole-src-4.0.3


3. phpize


4. ./configure --with-php-config=/usr/bin/php-config


5. make


6. make install


Installing shared extensions:     /usr/local/Cellar/php@7.0/7.0.29_1/pecl/20151012/
Installing header files:           /usr/local/Cellar/php@7.0/7.0.29_1/include/php/

7. php.iniconf.d
[swoole]
extension="/usr/local/Cellar/php@7.0/7.0.29_1/pecl/20151012/swoole.so"
```



 

```
phpize     

php-config    php
```
